"Night Ride: District B":
"In the Las Vegas District B, on planet
Earth, we have detected a large enemy
group reaction. Leaving it alone could
have adverse effects on the world.
Available ARKS are to rush to the site as
soon as possible, using the new mobile
weapon Rideroid, and subdue the enemies.
――――――――――――――――――――
Score is shared with the room.
Quest ends when time limit expires."

"We'll be transferring shortly.
This time, the area is Las Vegas, on planet Earth.
The purpose of this mission is to subdue the Phantom creatures."
"ARKS have a newly developed weapon, the Rideroid. Use it to ride freely around Las Vegas and defeat the enemies!"
